text: The 2011 Belgian Cup Final, named Cofidis Cup after the sponsor, was played on 21 May 2011 between Westerlo and Standard Liège. It was the 56th Belgian Cup final and was won by Standard Liège. ==Road to the Final== {|width=100% border=0 class=wikitable |- valign=top !colspan=3 width=45%|Westerlo!!width=10%|Round!!colspan=3 width=45%|Standard |- valign=top align=center |Roeselare [D2] H 2-0||align=left|Mravac 55' Dekelver 76' ||colspan=2 |Round Six|||Antwerp [D2] H 2-0||align=left|Opare 44' Nong 57' |- valign=top align=center |Anderlecht [D1] H 1-0||align=left|Henrique 47' ||colspan=2 |Round Seven||Genk [D1] H 2-1||align=left|Witsel 19' (pen.) Tchité 58' |- valign=top align=center |Lierse [D1] H 1-2||align=left|Dekelver 44' ||colspan=2 |Quarter Finals First Leg||Mechelen [D1] H 2-0||align=left|Tchité 24' Daerden 53' |- valign=top align=center |Lierse [D1] A 2-3||align=left|De Petter 32' Henrique 60' Dekelver 69' ||colspan=2 |Quarter Finals Second Leg||Mechelen [D1] A 1-4||align=left|Leye 48', 72' Tchité 64' Witsel 68' |-
